subtitle: Great for kids' parties, these savoury snacks can be served with tomato ketchup for dipping.

method.text: Put the milk into a large saucepan with the water. Bring to the boil then remove from the heat. Stir in the instant mashed potato powder. When evenly blended stir in the Parmesan cheese, green pepper, mustard and bacon. Leave to cool.

Cut the sausages in half through the middle and push each half on to the end of a wooden skewer. Shape some of the mashed potato mixture around each sausage, cover completely, and wrap with a bacon rasher.
Arrange the rockets in rows on a lightly greased baking tray and cover the ends of the skewers with a piece of foil. Bake for 20-25 min. Serve immediately.

title: Bacon and sausage rockets
